column4: hi, if i'm running ubuntu on dual boot with windows can i upgrade to a newer release through windows itself? will such an operation delete all my old ubuntu content?
@thesimkin - that's the thing - ur askin me to upgrade via update manager, but i want to upgrade from iso image via wubi/ deamon tools
you'd upgrade ubuntu in Ubuntu.
did you use Wubi?
i'd reinstall if you used wubi, I've heard bad results from upgrades
i'd remove what you have presently, you can reinstate files and such from backup
its a cleaner OS with none of the old configs could be the cause. I always clean install. Fewer issues imho
its not outright better, its a personaly preference
what GPU do you use?
did you try Unity2D session?
press CTRL+ALT+F1 and run:  killall -u $USER
on the login screen click the cog and log in to the Unity2D session
you will drop to CLI so you will have as much time as you have electricity
